name: prithee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to add emphasis when you are politely asking someone for something, or asking them to do something: Prithee, landlord, a jug of your finest ale! Prithee, speak. Synonym
please
More examplesFewer examplesWhat is the answer, prithee?Prithee, take this spending-money and fetch us something to eat."Prithee, friend, leave me alone with my patient," said the doctor.
